strategy: Saim-Hann Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Saim-Hann.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Wild Rider Host
formations.units: One Wild Riders unit and six Saim-Hann Jet Bikes
extraUnits: Add three Saim-Hann Jetbikes for 75 points, or six for 150 points
Replace any number of Saim-Hann Jetbikes with Saim-Hann Vypers: Free
Replace one Saim-Hann Jetbike with a Mounted Farseer: 25 points
(0-1 per army) Add a Wild Rider Chieftain to the Wild Riders unit: 50 points

formations.name: Shining Spears Warhost
formations.description: One Shining Spear Warhost for each Wild Rider Host.
upgrades: Add up to two Exarchs for 50 points each

sections.name: Saim-Hann Troupes
sections.description: Up to three for each Saim-Hann Host taken

formations.name: Mounted Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Three Wave Serpents and six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions
upgrades: 0-1 Exarch, Replace any number of Wave Serpents with two Eldar Falcons each, for 75 points each Wave Serpent replaced

formations.name: Engine of Vaul Troupe
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add one or two additional Engine of Vaul for 200 points each, chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

formations.name: Ranger Troupe
upgrades: Add up to four Eldar Rangers for 25 points each

formations.name: Hornets
upgrades: Add up to two Hornets for 35 points each

sections.name: Saim-Hann Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Saim-Hann Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add up to one Eldar Exarch to a Mounted Aspect Warrior Troupe

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Replace one Falcon with a Firestorm
